question: 練習
sourceMnemonic: You <kanji>practice</kanji> something to <kanji>learn</kanji> it. That's still called <vocabulary>practice</vocabulary>! The important part about this is that you're learning while you practice too. It's right in the word. So, when you practice kanji and Japanese vocab, make sure you're learning as well as practicing. If you're not learning, you're not really practicing, are you?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
